vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.30.11;
son of: Israel (H3478) and Zilpah (H2153);
brother of: Asher (H0836);
half-brother of: Reuben (H7205), Simeon (H8095), Levi (H3878), Judah (H3063), Dan (H1835H), Naphtali (H5321), Issachar (H3485), Zebulun (H2074), Dinah (H1783), Joseph (H3130) and Benjamin (H1144);
father of: Ziphion (H6837), Haggi (H2291), Shuni (H7764), Ezbon (H0675), Eri (H6179), Arod (H0720) and Areli (H0692)
§ Gad = "troop"
1) seventh son of Jacob by Zilpah, Leah's handmaid, and full brother of Asher.
2) the tribe descended from Gad
3) a prophet during the time of David; appears to have joined David when in the hold; reappears in connection with the punishment for taking a census; also assisted in the arrangements for the musical service of the "house of God"
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Jacob; fundador de una tribu de Israel; (b)   profeta; (c)   lugar
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
迦得 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "軍隊"
1) 雅各的第七個兒子, 為悉帕(利亞的侍女)所生
2) 迦得的後裔支派
3) 大衛時代的一位先知; 出現在大衛被追捕時與他會合; 與大衛普查
(兵員之數)而受的處罰有關(代上 21:9-19); 並且協助安排"上帝之家"的
音樂禮拜(代下 29:25)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
迦得 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "军队"
1) 雅各的第七个儿子, 为悉帕(利亚的侍女)所生
2) 迦得的后裔支派
3) 大卫时代的一位先知; 出现在大卫被追捕时与他会合; 与大卫普查
(兵员之数)而受的处罚有关(代上 21:9-19); 并且协助安排"上帝之家"的
音乐礼拜(代下 29:25)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.22.5
§ Gad = "troop"
1) seventh son of Jacob by Zilpah, Leah's handmaid, and full brother of Asher.
2) the tribe descended from Gad
3) a prophet during the time of David; appears to have joined David when in the hold; reappears in connection with the punishment for taking a census; also assisted in the arrangements for the musical service of the "house of God"

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Combined with di.von (דִּיבֹן, דִּימוֹן "Dibon" H1769)
§ Gad = "troop"
This name is used for:
1) seventh son of Jacob by Zilpah, Leah's handmaid, and full brother of Asher.
2) the tribe descended from Gad
3) a prophet during the time of David; appears to have joined David when in the hold; reappears in connection with the punishment for taking a census; also assisted in the arrangements for the musical service of the "house of God"
